page.title: 12HEALTH
page.content: {The Doctor's Surgery.}There is one doctor's surgery in Southminster.This belongs to Dr. Warren and is at his house on the{Burnham Road.}The practice has an{electrocard machine} and a dispensing surgery for patients who live one mile from a chemist. On average{40 appointments}are made each {day}and Dr. Warren has{5,500 patients {registered}with him.They come from all over the Dengie Hundred and as far away as Purleigh. The practice employs one other doctor apart from Dr. Warren, two nurses,two receptionists, one practice manager and one cleaner. The most{common ailments}are{throat {infections. } The{nearest hospitals}which have a{ {casualty unit}are{Broomfield}and{ {Basildon.}
